data.details: Eat the chicken and rice at the kitchen table.

data.outcome_description: At 05:04 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez ate the chicken and rice at the kitchen table.

data.narrative: At 05:04 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel carries the container of chicken and rice over to the small, round kitchen table. He clears a space, pushing aside a few stray papers and a coffee mug. Settling into a chair, he begins to eat, the warm food a comforting distraction from the cloudy afternoon outside and the faint, ever-present hum of the refrigerator (refrigerator_01).
